name: Campbell's Kitchen Chicken Broccoli Divan
author: Campbell's Kitchen
summary: This saucy classic pairs cooked chicken or turkey with broccoli in a cheesy sauce, which stirs together easily. Bake until piping hot and serve with hot biscuits or noodles.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh broccoli, cut into spears
1 ½ cups cubed cooked chicken or turkey
1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Broccoli Cheese Soup or Campbell's® Condensed 98% Fat Free Broccoli Cheese Soup*
directions: Arrange broccoli and chicken in 9-inch pie plate or 2-quart shallow baking dish
Mix soup and milk and pour over all
Mix bread crumbs with butter and sprinkle on top
Bake 400 degrees F for 25 minutes or until hot
